request.description:
You must provide either "discount" or "freeItems" or both.
"usageLimit" is optional.

You can use promotionCode or promotionId. 
Example:

"?promotionCode=DCWIEAJ" or "?promotionId=1"
status can take any of "Ongoing" or "Terminated"

Delivery method is either "Pickup" or "Courier".

You must provide either "pickupDetails" or "courierDetails", depending on the delivery method specified above.

Only the customer can update "received" status of the delivery.

Merchant can update the delivery "status" to "Delivered" if customer has marked it as "received" or if the order has been shipped at least 2weeks ago.
Only the customer that bought the items can initialise the order returns
